source: <tab>
Auto-attack<tab>Automatically attack your current target at a set interval determined by your weapon.
Jump<tab>Make a spring from the ground or other base by flexion and sudden muscular extension of the legs.

Limit BreakSpend energy stored in your party's limit gauge to execute a powerful battle technique. The technique executed is determined by the role of the party member who initiates it.
Tank: Increase party defense (area of effect: 50y).
Melee: Single-target attack.
Ranged: Attack to all targets in a straight line (range: 30y).
Caster: Area of effect attack (8y/10y/15y).
Healer: HP restoration. Raise at level 3 (area of effect: 50y).
※If target is not weakened at the time of Raise, the target will be restored in a non-weakened state. If target is weakened at the time of Raise, the weakness counter will reset.
target:
Limit BreakПотратить энергию, накопленную в шкале Limit Break вашей группы для выполнения мощного действия в бою. Выполняемое действие зависит от роли игрока, который исполняет это действие.
Tank: Увеличивает защиту членов группы (область действия: 50 ялм).
Melee: Атака в одну цель.
Ranged: Атака по прямой линии по всем врагам (дальность: 30 ялм).
Caster: Атака по области (8/10/15 ялм).
Healer: Восстанавливает HP членам группы. На уровне 3 умение вдобавок воскрешает игроков (область действия: 50 ялм).
※Если цель не была ослаблена в момент воскрешения, у неё не будет ослабления. Если цель была ослаблена в момент воскрешения, счётчик ослабления будет сброшен.

source:
SprintIncreases movement speed.
Duration: 10s (20s when not in combat)
※Unavailable in PvP.
Desynthesis<tab>Break down an item into one or more of its original materials.
Repair<tab>Use dark matter to mend damaged equipment.
target: Ремонт<tab>Использовать dark matter, чтобы починить повреждённое снаряжение.

source: Teleport<tab>Reduce your body to aether and instantly teleport to any aetheryte to which you have previously attuned. Requires a gil fee paid upon arrival at your destination.
Return<tab>Instantly return to your current home point.
target: Return<tab>Мгновенно вернуться в вашу домашнюю точку.

source: Mount Roulette<tab>Summon a mount at random.
Minion Roulette<tab>Summon a minion at random.
<tab>
Materia Melding<tab>Affix materia onto weapons and armor.
Advanced Materia Melding<tab>Affix materia onto weapons and armor. Can also affix materia to items with no slots remaining, but success is not guaranteed.
Materia Extraction<tab>Extract the aether from an item with a complete spiritbond, and then recrystallize the resulting residue into a concentrated substance known as “materia.”
Dye<tab>Use dye to color gear.
Target Forward<tab>Toggle forward through nearby enemies.
Target Back<tab>Toggle back through nearby enemies.
Set Down<tab>Put down the object you are carrying.
Decipher<tab>Remove a timeworn map from its glass prison and unlock its mysteries.
Dig<tab>Locate a buried treasure coffer within a 30-yalm radius and extract it from the ground.
Aetherial Reduction<tab>Break down an item to its aetherial components.
Cast Glamour<tab>Use a glamour prism to cast an optical illusion upon a piece of equipment, thus altering its appearance.
Dismount<tab>Dismount your current mount.
Flying Mount Roulette<tab>Summon a random flying mount.
Glamour Plate<tab>Create a set of multiple glamours to apply at once.
Duty Action I<tab>Execute a duty-specific action.
Duty Action II<tab>Execute a duty-specific action.
Put Away<tab>Stow personal effects.
Sort Pet Hotbar<tab>Change the order of hotbar-assigned actions.
Sort Pet Hotbar<tab>Change the order of hotbar-assigned actions.
